title: Cant login
body:
I unlogged from the league site and relogged and that worked fine. When i try to login to the league client it just says this http://prntscr.com/fh23zn
someone help

replies.body: This is likely a cause of the current maintenance on NA.  Some players are experiencing login issues, but you should be able to get in after giving it a moment and trying again.  We'll be providing updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page in the meantime too.  Hang tight!
Yeah I have been having this problem for a week now and haven't had it resolved. It is really frustrating. I can't even login when I try to submit a ticket online.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bGBfX9Yb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-07T17:42:59.394+0000)
>
> This is likely a cause of the current maintenance on NA.  Some players are experiencing login issues, but you should be able to get in after giving it a moment and trying again.  We'll be providing updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page in the meantime too.  Hang tight!

Yeah I'm going to call bullcrap on that one.   So far as I can tell from myself and others on discord servers I'm a part of many of us can't log on because of this "error" and it's not going away.  It would be more accurate to say we might get after the maintenance has finished.  Especially coming from some of us who have seldomly ever had technical issues with League before. ever.  And then suddenly this happens.
I am having the same problem

Hello I've had the same problem when my very own neighbor has logged in so im stuck but after waiting 30 minutes now I am able tto log in just check in every other 30 minutes like me and ill see you out there
GLHF!
II'm getting the same problem also. Same message.
